comment._content: 9 and 10 Broad Street, 1896 or later. (They were still there in 1909).

comment.author: 35727396@N03
comment._content: Two great images. The choice in the windows outstrips many a modern 'boot shop'. I really enjoy the work of Niall above and many of the other sleuths who track down so much information. Your site is always of interest.

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/35727396@N03] Thank you! Our site is mostly of interest because of the work of [http://www.flickr.com/photos/gnmcauley] and our other sleuths... :)
